prompt: What is the difference between an AI engineer, an AI developer, and an AI lecturer?
response: An AI engineer focuses on designing and optimizing machine learning systems, often bridging research and production. An AI developer implements AI features into software applications, prioritizing usability and integration. An AI lecturer primarily teaches the theory behind AI, often in academic settings, with less focus on deployment. While all three work in the AI space, their goals and day-to-day tasks differ significantly.
